actions.committee: House Committee on Foreign Affairs (Subsequently: International Relations)
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Foreign Affairs (Subsequently: International Relations).

official_title: Joint resolution commending the Cuban Declaration of Freedom.
subjects: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues

summary.text: Expresses the sense of the House of Representatives that the Cuban Freedom Declaration should be patriotically considered by all Cubans in exile and by all who wish to end the tyranny of Castroism and communism in Cuba and that the "Declaration of Freedom" should serve to unite those pledged to restoring Cuban liberty and independence.

titles.title: Joint resolution commending the Cuban Declaration of Freedom.
